genetic-algorithm.name: Genetic Algorithm
genetic-algorithm.description: A genetic algorithm is a search heuristic that is inspired by Charles Darwinâ€™s theory of natural evolution. This algorithm reflects the process of natural selection where the fittest individuals are selected for reproduction in order to produce offspring of the next generation.

simulated-annealing.name: Simulated Annealing
simulated-annealing.description: Simulated annealing is a probabilistic technique used for finding an approximate solution to an optimization problem. To find the optimal solution, the algorithm starts with a large random solution space and iteratively shrinks it down to the best solution.

gray-wolf-optimization.name: Gray Wolf Optimization
gray-wolf-optimization.description: Gray wolf optimization is a metaheuristic algorithm inspired by the social hierarchy and hunting mechanism of gray wolves. The algorithm is based on the leadership hierarchy and hunting mechanism of gray wolves in nature.

harmony-search.name: Harmony Search
harmony-search.description: Harmony search is a metaheuristic algorithm inspired by the musical improvisation process. The algorithm is based on the improvisation process of musicians in searching for a better state of harmony.

particle-swarm-optimization.name: Particle Swarm Optimization
particle-swarm-optimization.description: Particle swarm optimization is a population-based stochastic optimization technique inspired by the social behavior of birds flocking or fish schooling. The algorithm is based on the social behavior of individuals in a group.
